verses.verse: חַכְמ֣וֹת <WH2454> Every wise נָ֭שִׁים <WH802> woman בָּנְתָ֣ה <WH1129> buildeth בֵיתָ֑הּ <WH1004> her house וְ֝אִוֶּ֗לֶת <WH200> but the foolish בְּיָדֶ֥יהָ <WH3027> with her hands תֶהֶרְסֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH2040> plucketh it down

הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> He that walketh בְּ֭יָשְׁרוֹ <WH3476> in his uprightness יְרֵ֣א <WH3373> feareth יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וּנְל֖וֹז <WH3868> but [he that is] perverse דְּרָכָ֣יו <WH1870> in his ways בּוֹזֵֽהוּ׃ <WH959> despiseth

בְּֽפִי־ <WH6310> In the mouth אֱ֭וִיל <WH191> of the foolish חֹ֣טֶר <WH2415> [is] a rod גַּאֲוָ֑ה <WH1346> of pride וְשִׂפְתֵ֥י <WH8193> but the lips חֲ֝כָמִ֗ים <WH2450> of the wise תִּשְׁמוּרֵֽם׃ <WH8104> shall preserve

בְּאֵ֣ין <WH369> no אֲ֭לָפִים <WH504> Where no oxen אֵב֣וּס <WH18> [are] the crib בָּ֑ר <WH1249> [is] clean וְרָב־ <WH7230> but much תְּ֝בוּא֗וֹת <WH8393> increase בְּכֹ֣חַ <WH3581> [is] by the strength שֽׁוֹר׃ <WH7794> of the ox

עֵ֣ד <WH5707> witness אֱ֭מוּנִים <WH529> A faithful לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not יְכַזֵּ֑ב <WH3576> lies וְיָפִ֥יחַ <WH6315> will utter כְּ֝זָבִ֗ים <WH3577> will not lie עֵ֣ד <WH5707> witness שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> but a false

בִּקֶּשׁ־ <WH1245> seeketh לֵ֣ץ <WH3887> A scorner חָכְמָ֣ה <WH2451> wisdom וָאָ֑יִן <WH369> and none וְדַ֖עַת <WH1847> and [findeth it] not but knowledge לְנָב֣וֹן <WH995> unto him that understandeth נָקָֽל׃ <WH7043> [is] easy

לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Leave מִ֭נֶּגֶד <WH5048> from the presence לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man כְּסִ֑יל <WH3684> of a foolish וּבַל־ <WH1077> you will not יָ֝דַ֗עְתָּ <WH3045> when thou perceivest שִׂפְתֵי־ <WH8193> not [in him] the lips דָֽעַת׃ <WH1847> of knowledge

חָכְמַ֣ת <WH2451> The wisdom עָ֭רוּם <WH6175> of the prudent הָבִ֣ין <WH995> [is] to understand דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> his way וְאִוֶּ֖לֶת <WH200> but the folly כְּסִילִ֣ים <WH3684> of fools מִרְמָֽה׃ <WH4820> [is] deceit
אֱ֭וִלִים <WH191> Fools יָלִ֣יץ <WH3887> make a mock אָשָׁ֑ם <WH817> at sin וּבֵ֖ין <WH996> among יְשָׁרִ֣ים <WH3477> but among the righteous רָצֽוֹן׃ <WH7522> [there is] favour

לֵ֗ב <WH3820> The heart י֭וֹדֵעַ <WH3045> knoweth מָרַּ֣ת <WH4751> angry נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <WH5315> his own וּ֝בְשִׂמְחָת֗וֹ <WH8057> with his joy לֹא־ <WH3808> does not יִתְעָ֥רַב <WH6148> doth not intermeddle זָֽר׃ <WH2114> and a stranger

בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> The house רְ֭שָׁעִים <WH7563> of the wicked יִשָּׁמֵ֑ד <WH8045> shall be overthrown וְאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> but the tabernacle יְשָׁרִ֣ים <WH3477> of the upright יַפְרִֽיחַ׃ <WH6524> shall flourish

יֵ֤שׁ <WH3426> There is דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> a way יָ֭שָׁר <WH3477> which seemeth right לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> unto אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> a man וְ֝אַחֲרִיתָ֗הּ <WH319> but the end דַּרְכֵי־ <WH1870> thereof [are] the ways מָֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> of death

גַּם־ <WH1571> Even בִּשְׂח֥וֹק <WH7814> Even in laughter יִכְאַב־ <WH3510> is sorrowful לֵ֑ב <WH3820> the heart וְאַחֲרִיתָ֖הּ <WH319> and the end שִׂמְחָ֣ה <WH8057> of that mirth תוּגָֽה׃ <WH8424> [is] heaviness

מִדְּרָכָ֣יו <WH1870> with his own ways יִ֭שְׂבַּע <WH7646> shall be filled ס֣וּג <WH5472> The backslider לֵ֑ב <WH3820> in heart וּ֝מֵעָלָ֗יו <WH5921> and אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> and a good

פֶּ֭תִי <WH6612> The simple יַאֲמִ֣ין <WH539> believeth לְכָל־ <WH3605> everything דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> every word וְ֝עָר֗וּם <WH6175> but the prudent יָבִ֥ין <WH995> [man] looketh well לַאֲשֻׁרֽוֹ׃ <WH838> to his going

חָכָ֣ם <WH2450> A wise יָ֭רֵא <WH3373> [man] feareth וְסָ֣ר <WH5493> and departeth מֵרָ֑ע <WH7451> from evil וּ֝כְסִ֗יל <WH3684> but the fool מִתְעַבֵּ֥ר <WH5674> rageth וּבוֹטֵֽחַ׃ <WH982> and is confident

קְֽצַר־ <WH7116> [He that is] soon אַ֭פַּיִם <WH639> angry יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> dealeth אִוֶּ֑לֶת <WH200> foolishly וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> and a man מְ֝זִמּ֗וֹת <WH4209> of wicked devices יִשָּׂנֵֽא׃ <WH8130> is hated
נָחֲל֣וּ <WH5157> inherit פְתָאיִ֣ם <WH6612> The simple אִוֶּ֑לֶת <WH200> folly וַֽ֝עֲרוּמִ֗ים <WH6175> but the prudent יַכְתִּ֥רוּ <WH3803> are crowned דָֽעַת׃ <WH1847> with knowledge

שַׁח֣וּ <WH7817> bow רָ֭עִים <WH7451> The evil לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before טוֹבִ֑ים <WH2896> the good וּ֝רְשָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> and the wicked עַֽל־ <WH5921> at שַׁעֲרֵ֥י <WH8179> at the gates צַדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> of the righteous

גַּם־ <WH1571> even לְ֭רֵעֵהוּ <WH7453> even of his own neighbour יִשָּׂ֣נֵא <WH8130> is hated רָ֑שׁ <WH7326> The poor וְאֹהֲבֵ֖י <WH157> friends עָשִׁ֣יר <WH6223> but the rich רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> [hath] many

בָּז־ <WH936> He that despiseth לְרֵעֵ֥הוּ <WH7453> his neighbour חוֹטֵ֑א <WH2398> sinneth וּמְחוֹנֵ֖ן <WH2603> but he that hath mercy [עֲנָיִים כ] (עֲנָוִ֣ים <WH6041> afflicted ק) אַשְׁרָֽיו׃ <WH835> happy

הֲ‍ֽלוֹא־ <WH3808> not יִ֭תְעוּ <WH8582> Do they not err חֹ֣רְשֵׁי <WH2790> that devise רָ֑ע <WH7451> adversity וְחֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> favour וֶ֝אֱמֶ֗ת <WH571> and truth חֹ֣רְשֵׁי <WH2790> [shall be] to them that devise טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> good

בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עֶ֭צֶב <WH6089> In all labour יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become מוֹתָ֑ר <WH4195> there is profit וּדְבַר־ <WH1697> but the talk שְׂ֝פָתַ֗יִם <WH8193> of the lips אַךְ־ <WH389> only לְמַחְסֽוֹר׃ <WH4270> [tendeth] only to penury
עֲטֶ֣רֶת <WH5850> The crown חֲכָמִ֣ים <WH2450> of the wise עָשְׁרָ֑ם <WH6239> [is] their riches אִוֶּ֖לֶת <WH200> [but] the foolishness כְּסִילִ֣ים <WH3684> of fools אִוֶּֽלֶת׃ <WH200> [is] folly
מַצִּ֣יל <WH5337> delivereth נְ֭פָשׁוֹת <WH5315> souls עֵ֣ד <WH5707> witness אֱמֶ֑ת <WH571> A true וְיָפִ֖חַ <WH6315> [witness] speaketh כְּזָבִ֣ים <WH3577> lies מִרְמָֽה׃ <WH4820> but a deceitful

בְּיִרְאַ֣ת <WH3374> In the fear יְ֭הוָה <WH3069> God מִבְטַח־ <WH4009> confidence עֹ֑ז <WH5797> [is] strong וּ֝לְבָנָ֗יו <WH1121> and his children יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> will have מַחְסֶֽה׃ <WH4268> shall have a place of refuge

יִרְאַ֣ת <WH3374> The fear יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD מְק֣וֹר <WH4726> [is] a fountain חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> of life לָ֝ס֗וּר <WH5493> to depart מִמֹּ֥קְשֵׁי <WH4170> from the snares מָֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> of death

בְּרָב־ <WH7230> In the multitude עָ֥ם <WH5971> of people הַדְרַת־ <WH1927> honour מֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> [is] the king's וּבְאֶ֥פֶס <WH657> but in the want לְ֝אֹ֗ם <WH3816> of people מְחִתַּ֥ת <WH4288> [is] the destruction רָזֽוֹן׃ <WH7333> of the prince

אֶ֣רֶךְ <WH750> [He that is] slow אַ֭פַּיִם <WH639> to wrath רַב־ <WH7227> [is] of great תְּבוּנָ֑ה <WH8394> understanding וּקְצַר־ <WH7116> but [he that is] hasty ר֝֗וּחַ <WH7307> of spirit מֵרִ֥ים <WH7311> exalteth אִוֶּֽלֶת׃ <WH200> folly

חַיֵּ֣י <WH2416> [is] the life בְ֭שָׂרִים <WH1320> of the flesh לֵ֣ב <WH3820> heart מַרְפֵּ֑א <WH4832> A sound וּרְקַ֖ב <WH7538> the rottenness עֲצָמ֣וֹת <WH6106> of the bones קִנְאָֽה׃ <WH7068> but envy

עֹ֣שֵֽׁק־ <WH6231> He that oppresseth דָּ֭ל <WH1800> the poor חֵרֵ֣ף <WH2778> reproacheth עֹשֵׂ֑הוּ <WH6213> his Maker וּ֝מְכַבְּד֗וֹ <WH3513> but he that honoureth חֹנֵ֥ן <WH2603> him hath mercy אֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <WH34> on the poor
בְּֽ֭רָעָתוֹ <WH7451> in his wickedness יִדָּחֶ֣ה <WH1760> is driven away רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> The wicked וְחֹסֶ֖ה <WH2620> hath hope בְמוֹת֣וֹ <WH4194> in his death צַדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> but the righteous

בְּלֵ֣ב <WH3820> in the heart נָ֭בוֹן <WH995> of him that hath understanding תָּנ֣וּחַ <WH5117> resteth חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> Wisdom וּבְקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> but [that which is] in the midst כְּ֝סִילִ֗ים <WH3684> of fools תִּוָּדֵֽעַ׃ <WH3045> is made known
צְדָקָ֥ה <WH6666> Righteousness תְרֽוֹמֵֽם־ <WH7311> exalteth גּ֑וֹי <WH1471> a nation וְחֶ֖סֶד <WH2617> [is] a reproach לְאֻמִּ֣ים <WH3816> to any people חַטָּֽאת׃ <WH2403> but sin

רְֽצוֹן־ <WH7522> favour מֶ֭לֶךְ <WH4428> The king's לְעֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> servant מַשְׂכִּ֑יל <WH7919> [is] toward a wise וְ֝עֶבְרָת֗וֹ <WH5678> but his wrath תִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become מֵבִֽישׁ׃ <WH954> is [against] him that causeth shame
